name: Haven Security
description:
********************************************************
Welcome to the HAVEN SECURITY Import Center.
********************************************************

Congratulations for being selected to work at the HAVEN - humanity's last frontier. As HAVEN's new border officer, you must identify which vehicles are prohibited and which are allowed to enter.

Over time, you will discover the true nature of the HAVEN... if you can keep your job for long enough.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Taylor Jones - Development
Olivia Howarth - Game art
